com.spherebot.logging

Interface LoggerI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ErrorLogger, FileLogger

    public interface LoggerI
    Interface describing what a logger should do
    Author:
    Andy Guenin

    • Method Summary

      Logs errors
